survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate the effectiveness of networking opportunities provided during the recent industry conference, helping organizers improve future events.

questions.question_text: How satisfied were you with the networking opportunities at the conference?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Ensure mobile-friendly radio button selection.

script.question_text: How satisfied were you with the networking opportunities at the conference?

questions.question_text: Which networking formats did you participate in? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Include 'Other' with text input option.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes) with conditional text input for 'Other'

script.question_text: Which networking formats did you participate in? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What was the most valuable connection you made at the conference? (Please describe)
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Limit to 250 characters.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: OPEN_TEXT with character limit

script.question_text: What was the most valuable connection you made at the conference? (Please describe)

questions.question_text: How many meaningful professional connections did you establish during the conference?
questions.client_notes: Use pre-defined ranges for easier analysis. Ensure mobile-friendly selection.

script.question_text: How many meaningful professional connections did you establish during the conference?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for future conference networking opportunities?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather constructive feedback. Limit to 500 characters.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: OPEN_TEXT with character limit

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for future conference networking opportunities?
